name: Latrica Williams
text: I have been going here for 4 weeks and my therapist Corey is the best. He has excellent customer service. He is patient and very thorough about my treatment and my exercises. He not only answered my questions but also my family member questions as well. The ladies at the front desk are a joy to see each morning. They are very patient and have great customer service. Always a smile. Brent has excellent customer service he always jump in for encouragement. I am so glad my Doctor referred me here.

resp.text: Latrica, this is great news! We are thrilled your experience with our Wetumpka team was a positive one! Congratulations on all your hard work!

name: Charlotte Barber
text: Would not have wanted to take this journey without the professional and caring staff at Phoenix!!!! Although therapy is hard work, they encourage you through each day. The office staff is very kind and caring.They're the BEST!!!

resp.text: Charlotte, we are so happy to hear our Wetumpka team could help you through this tough time. Encouragement is so important when it comes to rehabilitation! Congrats on the hard work and thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience!

name: Darrell Bowden
text: Very knowledgeable staff. Friendly and professional. One of the best I've ever been to.

name: Priscilla Jones
text: Phoenix Physical Therapy has the friendliest physical therapists, along with a great atmosphere for receiving the results you need to get healthy and back to living without pain! I definitely recommend them if you are looking for a great place to receive physical therapy!

name: Mary Shearon
text: Very professional staff. There seems to be a lot of team work among the staff. The front staff is also very efficient, and pleasant. I would certainly recommend them for rehab therapy.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

name: Jennifer Berry
text: Went to my first PT session for back pain. My back feels amazing already!! Thank you Corey, Brent and the entire staff. Yall hooked me up today.  Thank you so much!

name: Debra Banker
text: Professionals who care. Nancy is a fantastic PA that encourages and pushes you to successful rehabilitation. Brent is an extremely insightful and knowledgeable PT. He is excellent in treatments of healing and diagnosing. They've hired quality staff. A special shout out to Dianna at the front desk who is always friendly despite her work load, never making you feel like you are intruding, great with scheduling, and friendly and welcoming. This is a great place, an asset to Wetumpka.

name: Harley Russell
text: By far one of the best facilities I have been to! The staff is so courteous and professional, I won’t go or recommend anywhere else. First place I have been to where they actually seem to want to help you get better while listening to your needs!!

name: clayton shepherd
text: This place and the staff are absolutely amazing. I give them full credit with getting back me back to my physical self. They made coming to rehab a thing I dreaded to something I looked forward to everyday. And I still come back and give thanks to this amazing staff for all they’ve done

resp.text: We love to hear that! Thanks for the wonderful review and congrats on your successful recovery.

name: Brenda Rogers
text: I was terrified "Rehab" sounded like months of pain and slow recovery, I was so wrong I was a new person in days! My family was shocked they did not think I could handle rehab but thanks to the extreme talent of my PT I am walking without using all the equipment I had needed just to stand. I'd recommend Phoenix Rehab to anyone, young or old.  Thank you Brent and staff for everything!

name: David Spradlin
text: Outstanding group of professionals. They've taken care of multiple family members and are always friendly and helpful.

name: Ashley Roberson
text: Great staff and wonderful facility! They have taken wonderful care of my son and the ladies at the front desk really make you feel like family!!

name: Char Tar
text: Ok honestly, my initial thought when my doctor recommended me to go to physical therapy was "OMG, this is gonna be stupid hard" But the therapist there are really awesome & they're super attentive to your needs.  Jason is top notch, and even though I thought most of my exercises were stupid, those stupid exercises helped my back feel the best it's felt in years!  Keep up the good work guys/gals & keep those stupid exercises in rotation so everyone can feel their very best!  : )

name: Beth Sorrells
text: Very good PT's. Brent really cares about this patients. The rest of the staff are friendly and and they have your recovery as their priority.  Very flexable on times, they understand that most people have jobs and have to work.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Beth. We're so happy you've found success at PHOENIX!

name: SawDav
text: Great PT, super understanding for athletes recovery  (as well as non)  took good care of me.

name: terri parker
text: Awesome place and awesome people! Great experience.

name: mega Luigi cyclops mister mlc
text: Awesome people and a great place

name: Sensei Lo
text: Very friendly and works with schedule

name: Bob Brune
text: Very nice personnel and professional. Great facility to have your company to teach introductory and standard safety training courses. The training kept me attentive and taught me a few things I was not previously knowledgeable about.

name: Steve Sippy
text: Very convenient for training with the computer lab.Ladies were nice and respectful

name: Doug Beard
text: I took the ADEM water operator certification exam here. The last time I took a similar exam, it was located in another place and the exam room was as small as a closet but there was plenty of room here. The staff was very friendly and patiently answered all of my questions.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Doug. We are glad your experience was a positive one!

name: Montel Troupe
text: Great instructors made it easy to learn everything

resp.text: We are glad that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Aaron Tribble
text: Treated me like i was at home.

name: Cheyenne Tucker
text: Some of the staff of kind of rude. My teacher was very informative but sped through the lesson faster than any of us could write. Nice place though. People just need to be more friendly...

name: KEN
text: "Coming out of the Nuclear/Natural-Gas/Solar/Fossil Fuel,  Power Industry, as a Professional Pressure Welder, As well as Quality Control Manager , & Upper management .. Superintendent Project Mgr. , I was amazed at the "Out-dated" Self Paced Training, you're selling to these local/ "Highly Respected by Me"!! [[local contractors]]!!! As for the global Giants like Bechtel, Day & Zimmerman, B & W, Alstom G.E. Westinghouse, or URS. , They wouldn't by you're {kindergarten cop} "credit-card style" Certificates!! "Somewhat Dissatisfied", was expecting a little more detail. Thank You.

name: Brian Rodgers
text: So, I went back today for my annual training and I felt compelled to revise my review. The staff today were all friendly and solution minded. I spoke with the manager and she indicated that unfriendliness is not going to be tolerated. I am happy to say that there have been improvements to the website and the overlap experience has been much improved.

name: Rusty Mizell
text: I was in Tennessee Valley Training Center today the videos were about as exciting as watching white paint dry, but the ladies running the place were AWESOME!

name: Andrew
text: If I could do 0 stars I would. I took a CompTia A+ exam here and thier was construction going on DURING TESTING HOURS. Hammers. Drills. Jackhammers. You name it. Could not concentrate. It is just crazy they would do that when people are testing. I complained to CompTia about it. The people working here are not very pleasing to deal with either.

name: Jens Lambert
text: Best place I have tested.  Professional, and I like the individual testing cubicles.

name: Vamsheedhar Reddy
text: Great Place for training. Very neat and calm

name: Hayward Hudgins
text: Great training center. I have received all my certifications that my company done sent me to get and still working on more

name: sam Garrard jr
text: Friendly people, very relaxed atmosphere, and very helpful..

name: dj Flex
text: Best training

name: Corey M
text: Good training but boring to no end.

name: Kenya Taylor
text: Good training

name: marvin hounshell
text: Great Staff

name: Bill Edgil
text: Good training

name: D Mlerz
text: Needs a few safety trainers that are actually certified professionals to train safety classes.

name: NitaBillS Schmidt
text: Well run, clean and friendly

name: jeff pitts
text: Very helpful and quick.

name: Daniel Zimmerman
text: Nice place.
